name: New clients need to provide their full name and email address
scenarioId: classpath:features/clients/registering_a_new_client:New clients need to provide their full name and email address
methodName: New clients need to provide their full name and email address

testSteps.description: 1: New clients need to provide their full name and email address ({firstName=Joe, lastName=, email=joe@smith.com})

children.description:
Given a trader with the following details:
| firstName | lastName | email |
| Joe |  | joe@smith.com |
When the trader attempts to register with BDD Trader
Tim the trader registers a client Joe null
Tim the trader executes a POST on the resource /client
POST http://localhost:8080/api/client

restQuery.responseHeaders:
Content-Type: application/json
Transfer-Encoding: chunked
Date: Thu, 15 Aug 2024 19:49:42 GMT
Keep-Alive: timeout=60
Connection: keep-alive

children.description: Then the registration should be rejected
An appropriate error code was returned

userStory.narrative:
New clients are given a portfolio with $1000 to start with.

  Name and email is mandatory, e.g:

  {Examples} New clients need to provide their full name and email address
